Description of incident: Unauthorized attempts were made to illegally transfer funds from an HTC bank account between February 1 and February 3 of 2012. The unauthorized party or parties were able to view a limited amount of automated payment records being processed by a third party vendor.  Names on customer bank accounts used for automated payments to HTC, customer bank account numbers used for automated payments to HTC, bank routing numbers used for automated payments to HTC, and customer HTC account numbers were exposed. HTC internal databases were not accessed.
